news1: ⭐ Key events this week : Here are some key upcoming events in the market this week. Automobile companies to release their monthly sales number for December 2022. India’s manufacturing PMI data will be released today. The minutes of the US Federal Reserve’s December meeting will be released on Wednesday.
news2: ⭐ Timeline extension by Adani Power : Adani Power has extended the timeline for the deal completion to acquire thermal power assets of DB Power. It has been extended till 15 January 2023. In August 2022, Adani Power agreed to acquire DB Power, which has a thermal power plant in  Chhattisgarh.
news3: ⭐ RITES signs MoU with KIIFCON : State-owned entity RITES has signed a MoU with KIIFCON, a consultancy organisation under the Kerala Infrastructure Investment Fund Board (KIIFB). It’s been done to jointly work on consultancy for transport and infrastructure projects.
